<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Get Map by Catalog ID
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/map/map/{catalogId}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This service message allows retrieval of a map by catalog ID with all its devices.
